Saving leftovers or planning 
meals can reduce waste 
and save up to 500g of CO₂ 
per day.

Choosing to walk instead 
of drive for under 3km 
can save ~0.4kg of CO₂ 
per trip.
Drink Tap water instead of bottled
Switching to refillable \nwater bottles cuts both /nplastic use and ~200g CO₂ \nper bottle.
Take part in a local clean-up

Cleaning up your 
neighborhood removes waste 
and builds eco-responsibility 
in the community.

Eating less meat just 
twice a week helps 
reduce up to 2.4kg of 
CO₂.

Sharing a ride with one 
friend cuts each person's 
carbon impact in half — or 
more.

Lower screen brightness, 
reduce refresh rates, and 
activate eco-mode on 
your laptop or phone.

Devices in standby mode 
still consume power — 
avoid this “phantom load” 
and save energy daily.
